meanings.sent1: The caver wore a helmet with a light while exploring the dark cave.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists watched the caver as he entered the mysterious cave.
meanings.sent3: The caver found a hidden treasure chest in the cave and couldn't believe his luck.
meanings.sent4: Like a brave knight, the caver delved into the depths of the cave, seeking adventure.
meanings.sent5: The caver's heart raced with excitement as he discovered ancient cave paintings.

meanings.definition: To explore caves as a hobby or profession.
meanings.sent1: She decided to caver in different parts of the world to study cave formations.
meanings.sent2: Every summer, the group of friends would caver in the nearby mountains.
meanings.sent3: The family planned to caver during their vacation, hoping to find interesting rocks.
meanings.sent4: His curiosity led him to caver in the unexplored caves of the remote island.
meanings.sent5: The team prepared their gear to caver into the unknown depths of the underground caverns.
